thinking: The page displays multiple options for disposable paper plates with 'Add to cart' buttons. The task is to buy a pack of disposable paper plates, so I will select one of the available options and proceed to add it to the cart.
The cart has been updated with the selected item. The next logical step is to click on the 'Shopping Cart' button to review the order and proceed to checkout.
The cart contains the correct item and the total price is displayed. The next step is to proceed to checkout to finalize the purchase.
The checkout page requires shipping details to proceed. I will fill in the required fields (name, phone, address), select a shipping method, and place the order to complete the purchase.
The page reloaded after inputting the name, so I need to fill in the phone and address fields again and proceed with placing the order.
The phone field has been filled in, but the page reloaded again. I will now fill in the address and proceed to place the order to complete the purchase.
All required fields have been filled, and the order summary is correct. The next and final step is to click the 'Place your order' button to finalize the purchase of the disposable paper plates.
The order has been placed, and the confirmation message is visible. The ultimate task of buying a pack of disposable paper plates is now complete.
